items.sentence: Tom showed Mary some pictures of his hometown.
I hope Tom likes the present I bought for him.
I hope Tom sings the song I asked him to sing.
I really was hoping Tom would be here tonight.
Tom discovered that his money had been stolen.
Who\'s that guy over there who looks like Tom?
Who\'s the best French speaker in your family?
Who\'s the person Tom went to visit in Boston?
Are you absolutely sure that Tom will do that?
Are you certain it was Tom who told Mary that?
Are you getting Tom anything for his birthday?
Are you going to continue working until 10:00?
Are you going to tell Tom about what happened?
Do you think it\'ll be easy for me to do that?
This is taking longer than I thought it would.
This is the knife that my grandfather gave me.
Is there anything that you\'d like to tell me?
You\'re a better dancer than Tom, aren\'t you?
You\'re a bit taller than Tom is, aren\'t you?
You\'re a little taller than Tom, aren\'t you?
